website_summaries.verdict: It features interchangeable backs, making it a 4-in-1 cover, and it feels like an Otterbox.
pros: The hard screen protector does not impede the touchscreen, and every inch of the phone is covered and protected
cons: The screen protector scratches easily, and you need to watch a video to know how to put the cover on

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this case for about 6 months now and it's amazing. The price is perfect and it's very durable. I have dropped my phone pretty badly quite a few times and the phone has remained in tact. The only issue is that the front plastic that protects the screen does get scratched easily. My keys were able to scratch it up bad enough just from being in the same pocket.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: One of my favorite phone cases
customer_reviews.text: One of my favorite phone cases! I love that there's the option of silver, chrome, gold, or camo. I drop my iphone all the time and it has never cracked. Definitely recommend--I bought this case a 2nd time already.
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Trunk Proof
customer_reviews.text: My husband left his phone encased in this case on the corner of his open trunk. And then slammed it shut. The case was destroyed, the phone is in great shape!! Worth every penny!!
customer_reviews.author: lizarvin

customer_reviews.title: Speakerphone NOT compatible
customer_reviews.text: The case is made very well, but the problem with it was that the speakerphone wouldn’t work with the design of it. The removable covers also came off too easy. They would pop out when you drop the phone. I had to send it back.
customer_reviews.author: Sreitzmas

customer_reviews.title: Great decent case
customer_reviews.text: Great decent case. It does add a little bit of bulk to the phone itself but its worth the protection the phone gets.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Romero

customer_reviews.title: Nice Case.
customer_reviews.text: Nice case. Good amount of protection for the size. Not too bulky, but enough to protect. Built in screen protector is nice and clear. Buttons work properly, charging cable fits properly. All in all, it is a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: bford

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my husband and he really liked it. It's very durable but not too clunky. Looks great and phone functions perfectly still.
customer_reviews.author: sicole

customer_reviews.title: Fits well and seems to protect well.
customer_reviews.text: Fits well and seems to protect well. The only complaint is that the ringer switch is really hard to reach when the case is on
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Szczepanski

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I am extremely pleased with the case for my I-phone, delivery took liitle time but product is good. I would highly recommend this product and I will use them again if it is ever needed.
customer_reviews.author: NT

customer_reviews.title: Not right for me.
customer_reviews.text: If you want an extremely safe case this is fine as it's extremely sturdy. But for me it made the phone too bulky and too heavy. It's now sitting in my drawer. My advice is to get to s store and try it out before buying.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Whitney

customer_reviews.title: Returning this case
customer_reviews.text: After a couple of weeks I have decided to return this phone case. Whenever I make phone calls no one can seem to hear me, and I have determined that it is not an issue about the strength of my reception. When I took the phone case off of my phone during phone calls, I could suddenly be heard by the people I had called. Also, the side buttons are hard to press, and the silent switch is hard to reach ... for some reason this case also interferes with the raise to wake function, which only works occasionally.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin

customer_reviews.title: Interferes with microphone level, also constantly turns on mute switch
customer_reviews.text: I loved this case until I began getting complaints about the volume. Apparently the case interferes with the microphone. Once I take the case off, people can hear me fine. Another complaint is the case makes it hard to switch to mute as the button is set too deep with the case installed.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Tomlinson

customer_reviews.title: It is even better than an otterbox
customer_reviews.text: It is even better than an otterbox. My iphone 8 plus is well protected and it looks cool ! Thank you for this well made product. It is perfectly designed and so well made. Hopefully TOTU will make more color on this design. I am surprised I paid 1/3 of an otterbox but get a top notch product.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Product works very well and fits my iPhone 7+ like a glove.
customer_reviews.author: Juice

customer_reviews.title: Good Value.
customer_reviews.text: Does what it says it does. I've dropped and dunked my iPad 7+ in salt water. No issues.
customer_reviews.author: A. C. Martin

customer_reviews.title: Love the case
customer_reviews.text: Love the case. The only problem I had with it was the screen protector popped out but other then that no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: It works and my phone is still in good condition.
customer_reviews.text: I drop my phone constantly. So I still pay for the insurance even after they raised the fee. it’s been over a year and my phone is still intact after constant drops. Yes it is working and saved my phone repeatedly!
customer_reviews.author: D&I

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I received this phone case. Few days ago it was packaged very well! And comes with 4 different backs to change the look there was plastic one the screen protecter to rotect it from scratches! I have been using a speck and a otter box but this seems to have about the same durability as the otter box! Love it
customer_reviews.author: Sashabreanna92

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and protective
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and protective. However, people on the other side of my call complain that my voice appears muffled.
customer_reviews.author: rockymeister

product_meta.title: TOTU iPhone 7 Plus Case Water Resistant Shock Absorbing Falling Preventing Protective Case Best Heavy Duty 4 Interchangeable Covers for Apple iPhone 7 Plus 5.5 inch
